description: This file defines a thread-safe in-memory repository class for managing Note entities within a note-taking backend application. It provides methods to list, retrieve, create, update, and delete notes and maintains internal state with auto-incremented IDs and timestamps.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory repository that manages Note objects, supporting CRUD operations with synchronization.

methods.name: None __init__(self)
methods.description: Initializes the repository with a threading lock, an empty notes dictionary, and sets the next ID to 1.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] list(self, q: Optional[str] = None, include_archived: bool = False)
methods.description: Returns a list of notes as dictionaries, optionally filtered by a search query and archived status, sorted by updated_at descending.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] get(self, id_: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID as a dictionary, or None if not found.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create(self, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a new note from provided payload, assigns it a new ID, and returns its dictionary representation.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] update(self, id_: int, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Updates an existing note with provided payload fields and returns the updated note as a dictionary, or None if not found.

methods.name: bool delete(self, id_: int)
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID, returning True if deletion was successful, False otherwise.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^    def create(self, payload: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: get
ctags.pattern: /^    def get(self, id_: int) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:$/

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^    def list(self, q: Optional[str] = None, include_archived: bool = False) -> List[Dict[str, An/
ctags.signature: (self, q: Optional[str] = None, include_archived: bool = False)

ctags.name: update
ctags.pattern: /^    def update(self, id_: int, payload: Dict[str, Any]) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:$/
